channel.title: GRC Port Scan- Stealth Mode Help
channel.description: I just ran a GRC Shields Up Port scan, and the port 43594 is In stealth. Which I suspect that means that the port is being forwarded to and extent but something is there blocking it from getting the rest of the way through. I am Using a 2Wire 2107 HG-B Router/Modem. Is there anyone who knows the steps needed to fully open this port and take it out of stealth mode?

item.title: GRC Port Scan- Stealth Mode Help

item.description:

Thanks a lot dude. you have saved me from having to run a shity hamachi server.
i would rep you but you already have 200 rep
so im just going to say thanks and i love you

Read full topic

The one on the computer.

item.title: GRC Port Scan- Stealth Mode Help
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

ITI Basak ITI:

I just ran a GRC Shields Up Port scan, and the port 43594 is In stealth. Which I suspect that means that the port is being forwarded to and extent but something is there blocking it from getting the rest of the way through. I am Using a 2Wire 2107 HG-B Router/Modem. Is there anyone who knows the steps needed to fully open this port and take it out of stealth mode?

Perhaps the local firewall is still blocking the connection.

Read full topic
